description: A shim to insulate apps from WebRTC spec changes and browser prefix differences

name: webrtc-adapter

scripts.postversion: export GITTAG="echo $(git describe --abbrev=0 --tags | sed 's/^v//')" && git push --force --set-upstream origin bumpVersion --follow-tags && git checkout gh-pages && git pull && cp out/adapter.js adapter.js && cp adapter.js adapter-`$GITTAG`.js && rm adapter-latest.js && ln -s adapter-`$GITTAG`.js adapter-latest.js && mkdir -p adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants && cp out/adapter.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants/ && cp out/adapter_*.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants/ && git add adapter.js adapter-latest.js adapter-`$GITTAG`.js adapter-`$GITTAG`-variants && git commit -m `$GITTAG` && git push --set-upstream origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.preversion: git stash && npm install && npm update && BROWSER=chrome BVER=stable CI=true npm test && git checkout -B bumpVersion && grunt build && grunt copyForPublish && git add package.json release/* && git commit -m 'Add adapter artifacts' --allow-empty
scripts.test: grunt && grunt downloadBrowser && mocha test/unit && karma start test/karma.conf.js
